ksdk:manifest.name: MEK-MIMX8QX
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.5.2 manifest file. It describes the content of the MEK-MIMX8QX and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.5.2

board.name: MEK-MIMX8QX
board.description: The mekmimx8qx is an development platform for MIMX8QX MCUs

specific.content: The i.MX8QX family of boards provides a powerful and flexible development system for NXPÂ®'s Cortex-M4 MCUs.

device.name: MIMX8QX6
device.description: The MIMX8QX contains ARM Cortex-M4 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

specific.content: The MIMX8QX contains ARM Cortex-M4 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
